Class ApplicationAsCustomer

java.lang.Object
MVC.simu.model.ApplicationAsCustomer
public class ApplicationAsCustomer extends Object
Represents a customer application in the simulation. Tracks arrival/removal times, document completeness, biometrics, approval status, and processing stages.

The application's progress is tracked using EventType, which defines stages such as: ARRIVAL, REAPPLICATION, BIOMETRICS, and other processing steps.

  • Constructor Summary

    ApplicationAsCustomer(boolean newApplication, boolean docsComplete)
    Creates a new application with specified type and document completeness.

  • Constructor Details

    • ApplicationAsCustomer

      public ApplicationAsCustomer(boolean newApplication, boolean docsComplete)
      Creates a new application with specified type and document completeness.
      Parameters:
      newApplication - true if this is a new application
      docsComplete - true if documents are complete

      Returns:
      the application ID

      public double getArrivalTime()
      Returns the arrival time of the application.
      Returns:
      the time the application entered the system

      Sets the arrival time of the application.
      Parameters:
      arrivalTime - the time the application entered the system

      public static List<ApplicationAsCustomer> getAllApplications()
      Returns the list of all applications in the system.
      Returns:
      list of all ApplicationAsCustomer instances

    • isNewApplication

      public boolean isNewApplication()
      Returns whether this is a new application.
      Returns:
      true if the application is new; false if it's a reapplication

    • isDocsComplete

      public boolean isDocsComplete()
      Returns whether the required documents are complete.
      Returns:
      true if documents are complete; false otherwise

    • requiresBiometrics

      public boolean requiresBiometrics()
      Returns whether biometrics are required for this application.
      Returns:
      true if biometrics are required; false otherwise

    • isApproved

      public boolean isApproved()
      Returns whether the application was approved.
      Returns:
      true if approved; false if denied

      Sets the current stage of the application. See EventType

    • getTimeInBiometrics

      public double getTimeInBiometrics()
      Returns the total time the application spent in the biometrics stage.
      Returns:
      time in biometrics, in simulation units

    • setTimeInBiometrics

      Sets the time spent in the biometrics stage.
      Parameters:
      time - the duration spent in biometrics

    • getTimeInWaitingRoom

      Returns:
      time in the waiting room, in simulation units

      public void setTimeInWaitingRoom(double time)
      Sets the time spent in the waiting room.
      Parameters:
      time - the duration spent waiting

    • getTimeEnteredQueue

      public double getTimeEnteredQueue()
      Returns the time the application entered a queue.
      Returns:
      timestamp of queue entry, or -1.0 if not yet entered

    • setTimeEnteredQueue

      public void setTimeEnteredQueue(double t)
      Sets the time the application entered a queue.
      Parameters:
      t - the time the application entered the queue

    • markReapplication

      public void markReapplication()
      Marks this application as a reapplication. Updates relevant flags (biometrics not required) and increments attempt count.

    • canReapply

      public boolean canReapply()
      Checks if the application can reapply, based on maximum allowed attempts.
      Returns:
      true if the application can reapply, false otherwise

    • resetIdCounter

      public static void resetIdCounter()
      Resets the application ID counter and clears all existing application records. Used to restart the simulation cleanly.

    • reportResults

      public void reportResults()
      Prints a summary report of the application's processing details in console.
